book.synopsis: Following the success of Harrius Potter et Philosophi Lapis comes a Latin edition of Harry Potter and the Chamber of Secrets, the second novel in the phenomenally successful saga of wizard-in-training Harry Potter. After a miserable summer with his relatives, the Dursleys, Harry returns to Hogwarts School of Witchcraft and Wizardry for his second year. There, he teams up again with bosom buddies Hermione and Ron to figure out who-or what-is behind the terrifying incidents that are leaving some students petrified...literally. Perfect for Latin scholars, collectors, or any Harry Potter fan who simply must have every book, no matter what language it
